name: iSeePets (Project1)
decription: Are you looking for the right special pet for you? Well if so, come use this app to help you find the perfect pet for you in your area. This app uses the google map and petfinder API to help locate different species of pet for your liking.
languages: HTML, CSS and Javascript, Google and Petfinder API Photoshop
